Class Word

java.lang.Object
appDomain.Word
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<Word>
public class Word extends Object implements Comparable<Word>, Serializable
Word class to store word information including files and line numbers where the word appears, and frequency of occurrence
See Also:

    • getFrequencyInFile

      public int getFrequencyInFile(String filename)
      Get frequency of this word in a specific file
      Parameters:
      filename - the file to check
      Returns:
      frequency in that file, or 0 if not found

    • getLineNumbers

      public ArrayList<Integer> getLineNumbers(String filename)
      Get line numbers for a specific file
      Parameters:
      filename - the file to get line numbers for
      Returns:
      ArrayList of line numbers, or null if file not found
